name: Whitebook for iPad Air / Samsung Note 10.1": WB S001-SL, cut boxcalf, black, 240p.
description:
Genuine quality leather, cut corners / two satin bookmarks / Swiss quality elastic closure / pocket for loose notes in front cover /  invisible card holders / pen holder, fits different sizes / back cover with 4 elastic corner straps / refillable, modular content / up to 4 journals with different paper styles / 240 pages, all pages detachable (invisible micro-perforation) / covers and back pages of journals embossed / designed and made in Switzerland

Available sizes (b x w)
- L:  25 x 20 cm (fits iPad 1&2) 
- SL: 25 x 18 cm (fits iPad Air, Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition)
- ML:  21 x 14.5 cm (fits iPad Mini, etc.)  
- M:  19 x 13.5 cm (Kindle 3G, etc.) 
- S:  14 x 10.5 cm

GOOD TO KNOW
Each Whitebook is a hand-crafted original, made in Switzerland.

FSC-certified paper is used in the production of Whitebook. The leather used is prepared according to strict environmental protection criteria.

description:
Cahiers/Journals Whitebook "Ursula"
(set of two) 

- cover: Whitebook, embossed
- cover inside: color red
- ruled/lined pages with vertical line
- 60 pages, all detachable (invisible micro perforation)
- rounded corners, acid free paper, FSC
- Keep your Flow: Napkin Folding

Available sizes (h x w)
- L: 248 x 190 mm, fits Whitebook Large 
- ML: 207 x 138 mm, fits Whitebook Medium-Large
- M: 190 x 134 mm, fits Whitebook Medium

name: Whitebook Planner/Diary 2013, monthly & weekly, 64 pages
description:
Whitebook Planner/Diary 2013

Available sizes (h x w)
- L: 248 x 190 mm, fits Whitebook Large 
- ML: 207 x 138 mm, fits Whitebook Medium-Large
- M: 190 x 134 mm, fits Whitebook Medium
- S: 134 x 90 mm, fits Whitebook Small)

Content: 
- Overview 2013 / 2014
- Monthly planner for 2013 and 2014 (3 months per page)
- Weekly planner for 2013 (1 week per page)
- Official holidays in United Kingdom, Switzerland, Germany, Austria, Sweden, France, Italy, Spain, United States, Brazil, Russia

- Cover Whitebook, embossed,
- Cover inside: color blue
- 64 pages 
- rounded corners, acid free paper, FSC
- Keep your flow page: Name the cities
